channel.title: Lebanon disaster - GLIDE Code
channel.description:
Hi, in case it's useful, the GLIDE code for the Lebanon disaster (port explosion) is OT-2020-000177-LBN
https://glidenumber.net/glide/public/search/details.jsp?glide=22036&record=1&last=14
and
https://reliefweb.int/disaster/ot-2020-000177-lbn
Really interesting to see reliefweb using the GLIDE code as the page ref for the disaster.
Not sure what the HRP code is so if anyone has it, please share here.

item.title: Lebanon disaster - GLIDE Code
item.dc:creator: petyakangalova
item.description:
Thanks for sharing @SJohns!

I have been in touch with @ximboden to check if there is an HRP code, but not heard back yet! I cannot find anything public yet. If others are aware, please do respond to this thread.

Read full topic
